.
Jurisdiction of the Rating Activity Over the Severance of SC
The rating activity may reverse a previous decision to grant SC under
38 CFR 3.105(d)
if it finds that SC was granted based on a CUE.  This means that the original decision had no plausible basis in the law or particular facts of the case.  The error must be undebatable and not a mere difference in judgment between decision makers.
When the rating activity discovers a CUE that will require the severance of SC to correct, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5.C.1
.
Reference
:  For more information on severing SC, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 5.B
.
